rows.name: intro_text
rows.value:
**Welcome!** We hope you enjoy using this app by Early Family Math. It is in the early stages of development. We encourage you to send us feedback about what we are doing well and what some growth areas are.

**Introduction:** There are two entry points for using this app.
* Topics. This will take you to a hierarchical list of the math subjects covered. Each topic has about 2 screens-worth of explanation. Each topic page links to a Glossary, and it also links to a Resource Finder, which provides a list of all the resources associated with this topic.
* Resources. This section has direct links to the Resource Finder and Glossary. It also has links to Routines (short 2 to 10 minute actiivities), Rich Tasks (30 to 120 minute activities), Puzzles, Games, and Storybooks

**To Be Done:** When finished, this section will also have our favorite examples so that new users will see what wonderful things this app offers and therefore want to continue using it.
